name: Essex Theater
description: The grand dame of Hill Valley's entertainment scene. The Essex Theater is a beautiful movie palace, its marquee ablaze with the title of the latest Hollywood blockbuster. The air is filled with the scent of fresh popcorn and the excited chatter of moviegoers. A friendly usher in a smart uniform tears your ticket with a smile, and the plush red velvet seats promise a comfortable escape into a world of adventure and romance. This is where dreams come to life on the silver screen.
